col.name: study_name
description: Dataset name.

col.name: sample_id
description: Sample identifier.

col.name: subject_id
description: Subject identifier.

col.name: age
description: Age of the subject using the unit specified under 'age_unit' column

col.name: age_unit
description: Unit of the subject's age specified under 'age' column

col.name: age_group
description: 11 <= Adolescent < 18|18 <= Adult < 65|2 <= Children 2-11 Years Old < 11|65 <= Elderly < 130|0 <= Infant < 2

col.name: control
description: Whether the sample is control, case, or not used in the study

col.name: target_condition
allowedvalues: human gut microbiome|Parkinson disease|Oral Microbiome|premature birth|Schizophrenia|rheumatoid arthritis|ankylosing spondylitis|Alzheimer's disease|gestational diabetes|chorioamnionitis|preeclampsia|acute diarrhea|Cholera|Prevotella copri|colorectal cancer|carcinoma|Adenoma|melanoma|Metastases status (attribute)|Peri-Implantitis|Mucositis|adenocarcinoma|Inflammatory Bowel Disease|Intestinal Flora|Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus|human microbiome|abnormal glucose tolerance|Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus|diarrhea|clostridium difficile infection|Multidrug-resistant bacteria (organism)|Crohn's disease|atherosclerosis|hypertension|metabolic syndrome|Shiga Toxin-producing Escherichia coli|Non-alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease|Weight loss|Metabolic Syndrome|control|Heart Failure|myalgic encephalomeyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome|human skin microbiome interaction|cirrhosis of liver|Cephalosporin Antibiotic|Helminth|periodontitis|arthritis|psoriasis|otitis|pneumonia|bronchitis|Respiratory tract infection|sepsis|Skin Infection|Cough|gastroenteritis|Tonsillitis|pyelonephritis|cystitis|Fever|Infection|stomatitis|salmonellosis|Migraine|Asthma|Behcet's syndrome

col.name: treatment
allowedvalues: EC 3.4.23.15 (renin) inhibitor|second generation antipsychotic|red yeast rice supplement|Mesalamine|Acarbose|ACE Inhibitor|Albendazole|Amiodarone|Antihelminthic Agent|Antihypertensive Agent|Antiretroviral Therapy|Antiviral Agent|Anti-diabetic Agent|Antilipidemic Agent|Antineoplastic Agent|Thrombolytic Agent|Aspirin|Angiotensin II Receptor Antagonist|Azathioprine|Beta-Adrenergic Antagonist|Calcium Channel Blocker|Clopidogrel|Therapeutic Corticosteroid|Anti-CTLA-4 Monoclonal Antibody|Coumarin|Digitalis|Diuretic|Dopamine Antagonist|Dipeptidyl Peptidase-4 Inhibitor|Enteral Tube Feeding|Ezetimibe|Fibrate Antilipidemic Agent|Folate supplement (substance)|Dietary Supplement|Insulin Glargine|Thiazolidinedione Antidiabetic Agent|GLP-1 Mimetics|Heparin|Therapeutic Insulin|Ipilimumab|Iron|Insulin, NPH|Potassium-Sparing Diuretic|Lactulose|Laxative|Metformin|Metformin Hydrochloride|Methotrexate|Pediatric Nutritional Supplement Drink|Nitrate|Nivolumab|None|Insulin Aspart|Nonsteroidal Antiinflammatory Drug|Opioid|Antiarrhythmic Agent|Anti-PD1 Monoclonal Antibody|Pembrolizumab|Proton Pump Inhibitor|Probiotic|Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitor|SGLT2 Inhibitor|Sitagliptin|HMG-CoA Reductase Inhibitor|Steroid Compound|Sulfonylurea Antidiabetic Agent|Thiazide Diuretic|Citrate-containing Alkalinizing Agent|Xanthine Oxidase Inhibitor|Centrally acting hypotensive agent (substance)|Phenylpiperidine derivative (substance)
description: Medication(s)/treatment(s) applied to the subject

col.name: bodysite
description: Subject's bodysite the given sample was collected from

col.name: body_subsite
allowedvalues: elbow|retroauricular region|vagina orifice|anterior naris|buccal mucosa|chest|hard palate|gingiva|left ear|lung|median vaginal canal|palatine tonsil|posterior fornix of vagina|rectum|right ear|saliva|sputum|subgingival dental plaque|supragingival dental plaque|throat|dorsum of tongue|dentition|colon|sigmoid colon|lumbar vertebra 2|lumbar vertebra 3|lumbar vertebra 4|left colon|right colon
description: Subject's body subsite the given sample was collected from. Should be more specific information than bodysite

col.name: sex
description: Biological sex of the subject

col.name: antibiotics_current_use
description: Antibiotics current usage. `Yes` for currently using and `No` for not using

col.name: biomarker_name
allowedvalues: Triglyceride Measurement|Glycosylated Hemoglobin (HbA1C) Measurement|Cholesterol Measurement|LDL Particles Measurement|High Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Measurement|High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Measurement|Diastolic Blood Pressure|Systolic Blood Pressure|Creatinine Measurement|Albumin Measurement|human MHC class II protein complex with serotype|Direct Bilirubin Measurement|Glucose Measurement|High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein (hsCRP) Measurement|Urea Nitrogen Measurement|Creatine Measurement|Aspartate Aminotransferase Measurement|Globulin Protein Measurement|Alanine Aminotransferase Measurement|Prothrombin Time|C-peptide Measurement|White blood cell count (procedure)|Red blood cell count (procedure)|Hemoglobinometry|fasting blood glucose measurement|Glucagon-like Peptide-1 Measurement|Scavenger Receptor Cysteine-Rich Type 1 Protein M130 (CD163) Measurement|Interleukin 1 Measurement|Fibroblast Growth Factor 19 Measurement|Measurement of glutamate decarboxylase 65 antibody (procedure)|Adiponectin Measurement|Leptin Measurement|International Normalized Ratio of Prothrombin Time (INR)|Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate|fasting blood insulin measurement|HLA Complex|Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate Measurement|Autoantibody titer measurement (procedure)

col.name: Probing_pocket_depth
description: Depth of periodontal pocket (observable entity)

col.name: dietary_restriction
description: Dietary regime (partial match to SNOMED:182922004 or SNOMED:162536008)

col.name: feces_phenotype_metric
allowedvalues: Bristol stool form score (observable entity)|Calprotectin Measurement|Harvey-Bradshaw Index Clinical Classification
description: Measurements collected from stool sample, including observation, chemical test, and diagnostic procedure

col.name: feces_phenotype_value
description: Measured value for the metric specified under 'feces_phenotype_metric'

col.name: FMT_id
description: The id assigned to the FMT (Fecal microbiota transplantation) participants in the study

col.name: FMT_role
description: The role of the FMT (Fecal microbiota transplantation) participants. For recipient's samples, timing information (i.e., before or after FMT) is included as well.

col.name: neonatal
description: NA

col.name: westernized
description: The typical Western (American) diet charactered by low in fruits and vegetables, and high in fat and sodium. Also, refers the diet consists of large portions, high calories, and excess sugar

col.name: obgyn_menopause
description: An indicator as to whether the female subject is in menopause

col.name: obgyn_pregnancy
description: The pregnancy status of an individual.

col.name: obgyn_birth_control
description: Use of birth control pill (Oral Contraceptive)

col.name: RECIST
allowedvalues: RECIST Complete Response|RECIST Partial Response|RECIST Progressive Disease|RECIST Stable Disease
description: Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST, DICOM:112022): Standard parameters to be used when documenting response of solid tumors to treatment; a set of published rules that define when cancer patients improve (`respond`), stay the same (`stable`), or worsen (`progression`) during treatments. (from www.recist.com)

col.name: ORR
description: Overal Response (ORR, NCIT:C96613): An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy

col.name: PFS
description: Progression Free Survival (PFS, EFO:0004920): Progression free survival is a measurement from a defined time point e.g. diagnosis and indicates that the disease did not progress i.e. tumours did not increase in size and new incidences did not occur. PFS is usually used in analyzing results of treatment for advanced disease.

col.name: PFS_timepoint_months
description: A time point used to observe PFS. Unit is 'month'

col.name: smoker
description: Tobacco smoking behavior

col.name: BMI
description: Body mass index (kg/m2).

col.name: lifestyle
description: to describe the lifestyle of non-westernized people

col.name: days_from_first_collection
description: Used for time series studies.

col.name: sequencing_platform
description: This will be modified as new sequencing platforms are added to the database.

col.name: DNA_extraction_kit
description: DNA extraction kit.

col.name: PMID
description: Identifier of the main publication in PubMed.

col.name: number_reads
description: Number of final reads - calculated from raw data.

col.name: number_bases
description: Total number of bases sequenced in the sample - calculated from raw data.

col.name: minimum_read_length
description: Minimum read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: median_read_length
description: Median read length - calculated from raw data.

col.name: NCBI_accession
description: Semicolon-separated vector of NCBI accessions.

col.name: family
description: A number identifying the family subjects belong; not corrected for meta-analyses.

col.name: family_role
description: Role in the family when multiple samples come from the same family but different persons.

col.name: zigosity
description: Zigosity.

col.name: subcohort
description: Identifier of a sub-set of the cohort. Can be everything.

col.name: curator
description: Curator name.

col.name: uncurated_metadata
description: A row for whatever field has not be included here.
